#summary Installing Gource on Mac OS

== Homebrew ==

You can get Gource via [http://mxcl.github.com/homebrew/ Homebrew]:

{{{
brew install gource
}}}

This is typically more up to date than the version via Macports.

== Macports ==

Gource is also in [http://www.macports.org/ Macports]. [http://www.macports.org/install.php Once you have installed Macports] you can install gource with this command:

{{{
sudo port install gource
}}}
